评论概述: Adorable and Cozy Outfit for Little Ones
评论详情: This two-piece fall outfit is both adorable and practical for my toddler. The "Mama's Boy" embroidery adds a cute touch, and the fabric is soft and comfortable, perfect for cooler weather. The elastic pants fit well and allow for easy movement, which is great for active toddlers. The set washes well and hasn’t faded after multiple wears. It’s a good value for the price, though I wish the material were slightly thicker for colder days. Overall, it’s a stylish and cozy option for fall and winter!
so cute and adorable, great material and size is perfect

评论概述: Not Sweatshirt Fabric, but Very Comfy
评论详情: First of all, what caught my eye was that this shirt was embroidered, not a screen print! It improves the quality of the shirt by a mile. Second, the fabric is NOT sweatshirt material. It is thin, more like a jersey knit. We live in the southeastern U.S., so lighter fabric works all year. I laundered the outfit in cold water and dried it on low heat. The black embroidery did not fade onto the khaki shirt. The black pants remained colorfast. The ensemble is true to size and appears to be made exceptionally well. Considering the embroidery, this is a value-priced set for your little one.
The shirt feels like it would be a little breezy but it feels smooth. I think little man likes this outfit, and I definitely like what the shirt says.
Made of midweight material, perfect for fall and winter.  Fits according to chart and looks so cute!

I got this set as a baby shower gift for a baby boy. It is super cute! The sweatshirt and sweatpants look nicely made, and look like they will hold up to washing and wearing very well. I got a 0-3 months, for a newborn, they are very small! If you are looking for longer lasting wear, I would suggest going up to the next size range.

Got the outfit for my son who is due in October. He most likely wont be able to wear this right away since the sizing is 0-6 months, I anticipate probably around the 3 month mark is when he may be able to fit this. Which would be January and still cold so it would be fine fort that weather. He will be able to wear until April most likely. This seems more 3-6 months, because it is on the bigger side to accommodate a larger span of time. It's a cute outfit and I can't wait until he's here, he will indeed be a mama's boy for sure!
